"Urbanism News In The Official Egyptian Gazette (al-Waqฤสพiสฟ al-Miแนฃrฤซyah), 1828-1914 - An Ottoman Arabic Digital Humanities Project" Hugh Cayless Nour Kanaan Adam Mestyan Danah Younis Sarah Fathallah Gaara Arif Erbil Ahmed Kamal Abram Smith Clara Harms Hรผseyin Saฤlam Abdulrahman El-Taliawi Hiba Laabadli Othmane Echchabi Fatemah Almahana Mahmoud Zaki Nehal al-Shamy Vishal Jammulapati Project co-director Hugh Cayless Primary Investigator Adam Mestyan Project co-director Mercedes Volait Research Assistant Sarah Fathallah Gaara Research Assistant Karima Nasr Research Assistant Rezk Nori Research Assistant Arif Erbil Research Assistant Ahmed Kamal Research Assistant Abram Smith Research Assistant Clara Harms Research Assistant Hรผseyin Saฤlam Research Assistant Abdulrahman El-Taliawi Research Assistant Hiba Laabadli Research Assistant Othmane Echchabi Research Assistant Fatemah Almahana Research Assistant Mahmoud Zaki Research Assistant Nehal al-Shamy Research Assistant Vishal Jammulapati National Endowment for the Humanities, Institut franรงais dโarchรฉologie orientale (Ifao, Cairo); Franklin Humanities Institute and the Office of Global Affairs / Andrew W. Mellon Endowment for Global Studies, Duke University; Duke University Libraries; Centre national de la recherche scientifique; the Office of the Hungarian Cultural Counsellor in Cairo. "A TEI Edition of Urbanism News in al-Waqฤสพiสฟ al-Miแนฃrฤซyah, 1828-1914" Created by the "Digital Cairo" project (Duke University - Ifao), sponsored by the National Endowment for the Humanities. Website Project directors: Adam Mestyan, Mercedes Volait, Hugh Cayless Al-Waqฤสพiสฟ al-Miแนฃrฤซyah (Egyptian Affairs) newspaper, 1828โ1914. born digital document This is a file in the "XMl TEI Edition of Urbanism News in al-Waqฤสพiสฟ al-Miแนฃrฤซyah" in the project "La fabrique du Caire moderne, 2018-2021" (Ifao-InVisu-Duke University). The "Digital Cairo" project is sponsored by the National Endowment for the Humanities. Rules of TEI XML MarkUp in This Project We use the Arabic script but transliteration into Latin characters follows the Library of Congress (LOC) Arabic transliteration chart. Each individual article has an individual xml:id number starting with "w1" We only use persName, orgName, placeName elements, apart from bibliographical elements and notes. If the location or organization of responsibility is known from the text, it can be added in an attribute to a persName. "Mashaykhah" and "thumn" are orgNames and placeNames. This project's schema considers Till Grallert's work in his Open Arabic Periodical Editions. ๐ข ๐ค Arabic English Arabic transcribed according to ALA-LC Ottoman ูข ุฌูุงุฏู ุงูุงููู ูกูฃููก ุฃููุฏู ุงูุจูุฑู) ุฃุคูุฏ ูุง ุฑุข ุณุนุงุฏุชู (ูุญูุฏ ุจู ุงูุดูุงุฑุจู) ุจูุงุก ูุง ุฑุฃุชู ุงููุฌูุฉ ุฃูุถุญ (ุนูุถ ุจู ุณุนุฏ ุงููู) ุฃุคูุฏ ูุฐุง ุงูุฑุฃู (ุงูุณูุฏ ูุญูุฏ ุงูุนุจุงุณู) ูุง ุฑุฃุชู ุงููุฌูุฉ ูู ูุญูู ุงูุง ูู ุชุนููู ุฃุฎุฐ ุงูุนูุงุฆุฏ ุนูู ุงููุงุจูุฑุงุช ูุงููุนุงูู ูููุฒู ุงู ูุถุงู ุจุนุฏ ุงููุงุจูุฑุงุช ุงูุขุชูุฉ ูู ุงููุฌู ุงูุซุงูู ูููุง (ูุง ุนุฏุง ูุงุจูุฑุงุช ุงูููุงู) (ุญุณู ุจุงุดุง ุญููู) ุฃุฑู ููุงููุฉ ูุงุฏุฉ ุงููุดุฑูุน ูููู ููุฒู ุฃู ูุฒุงุฏ ุนูููุง ุจูุฏุฑ ุจุนุฏ ุฌูุฏ ูู ุงููุฌู ุงูุงูู ูููุง (ุณุนุงุฏุฉ ุงููููู) ุชุคุฎุฐ ุงูุขุฑุงุก ุฃุฎุฐุช ูุตุงุฏูุช ุงูุงุบูุจูุฉ ูุจูู ุจูุงุก ูุณุชุญูุฉ ูุฑุจุท ุงูุนูุงุฆุฏ ุนูููุง) (ุณุนุงุฏุฉ ุงูุฑุฆูุณ) ุชุคุฎุฐ ุงูุขุฑุงุก ุฃุฎุฐุช ูุตุงุฏูุช ุงูุงุบูุจูุฉ ุนูู ูุจูู ูุฐู ุงูุฒูุงุฏุฉ ูุงู ุชููู ุงููุฌูุฉ) ุชููุช ููุจูุช ุจุงูุงุบูุจูุฉ ููุตูุง (ุจุญุณุจ ุงูุงุตู) (ุงููุงุฏุฉ ุงูุณุงุจุนุฉ) ุนูู ุงูุฏุงุฆุฑุฉ ุงูุจูุฏูุฉ ุฃูุงููุฏูุฑูุฉ ุฃูุงููุญุงูุธุฉ (ุงูุจุงุจ ุงูุงูู) (ูู ุฌุฑุฏ ูุชุนุฏุงุฏ ุงูุงููุงู ูุชูุฏูุฑ ูููุฉ ุฃุฌุฑุชูุง) (ุงููุงุฏุฉ ุงูุงููู) ุชุฌุฑุฏ ุงูุงููุงู ูู ูู ุณูุชูู ูุฑุฉ ููุดุฑุน ูู ูู ุงูุฒูุงุฏุฉ ูุงูุชูุฒูู) (ุงููุงุฏุฉ ุงูุฎุงูุณุฉ) ุงูุงุจููุฉ ุงูุฌุฏูุฏุฉ ุฃู ุงูุชู ูุชุฌุฏุฏ ุจูุงุคูุง ูุตุงุฑุช ูุงุจูู ูุฑุจุท ุงูุนูุงุฆุฏ ุนูููุง ุงูุจูุฑู) (ุงูุณูุฏ ุนุจุฏ ุงูุฎุงูู ุงูุณุงุฏุงุช) (ุฃุนุถุง) (ุฃุนุถุง) (ูุตุทูู ุงูุทุญุงู) (ูุญูุฏ ุงูุณูููู) ุณูููุงู ุจุงุดุง ุฃุจุงุธู) ุงุฐุง ูุงูู ูููุชู
